name: Catstle Defender
description:
Kitty Kingdom is under siege by reptiles and rodents alike!

Protect the final feline frontier with a whole-host of RPG-themed kitty cats, all armed to the claw with every weapon the kingdom has to offer. 

Throw yarn bombs, adorn towers with skilled archers, and scratch your way to victory... or at least hold back the onslaught!

'Catstle Defender' was made on a 24-hour livestream as a part of a personal game-jam for practice coding. All together there was around 20 hours of time spent in GameMaker alone. 

Special thanks to rutrine for pixel art, and Astounding_Gamer for the background music!
